bands.name: Bebop Poetry
bands.text: When spoken word artist Kenny Gomes meets Martijn van Ditshuizen's jazz quartet, magic happens. Composition and improvisation blend together seamlessly as the audience is taken on a captivating journey.

bands.name: Kris Ransijn Trio
bands.text: Kris Ransijn Trio consists of three young driven musicians. They play surprising and refreshing compositions based on experiences, emotions and musical styles from every corner of the world.

bands.name: Between the Lines
bands.text: Imagine yourself walking down the streets of New Orleans.

bands.name: Hoogland, Ransijn & van Stralen
bands.text: Lars Hoogland, Kris Ransijn and Elbrich van Stralen are constantly challenging, searching and finding each other in their improvisations.

bands.name: Jazzduo Salted Butter
bands.text: Butter is the basis of any great sandwich, but butter has little flavor of its own. Much like the jazz standard, adding just a pinch of salt will make it a lot more interesting. Jazzduo Salted Butter tkaes the Jazz Standard with a grain of salt for a tasteful and innovative performance.

bands.name: Blazers Collectief West
bands.text: Blazers Collectief West was founded for the Westland NYE concert. Directed by its musical leader Erik-Jan de With, the collective turned out to be a golden combination.
